title: The Last of the Spirits
description: On the bleak streets of London, Sam is freezing and hungry. When he is rudely refused help by Ebenezer Scrooge, Sam vows to kill the selfish man. But later, while Sam is huddled in a graveyard, a ghost warns him of the terrible fate that awaits if he chooses the path of murder. And so Sam begins journey led by terrifying spirits through past, present and future. After which he must decide his own destiny.In this brilliant twist on A Christmas Carol, Chris Priestley masterfully reinvents a treasured classic.
author: Chris Priestley
